metadata.Title: CVE-2021-25218 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In BIND 9.16.19, 9.17.16. Also, version 9.16.19-S1 of BIND Supported Preview Edition When a vulnerable version of named receives a query under the circumstances described above, the named process will terminate due to a failed assertion check. The vulnerability affects only BIND 9 releases 9.16.19, 9.17.16, and release 9.16.19-S1 of the BIND Supported Preview Edition.

notes.Note: alexmurray> Only affects version 9.16.19 so all current version in Ubuntu are not affected.

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
